sentences.sContent: The findings of this sociologist are very interesting because they illustrate once again the relationship that exists between what we do in the present and the results we obtain in the future.
sentences.sContent_eng: The findings of this sociologist are very interesting because they illustrate once again the relationship that exists between what we do in the present and the results we obtain in the future.
sentences.sCn: 这个社会学家的发现是非常有趣的，因为他们在一次的说明我们现在做的和我们未来获得的结果有关系。

sentences.sContent: Not only is social class supposed not to exist in America, it is almost a dirty word—“America's forbidden thought”, in the words of one sociologist.
sentences.sContent_eng: Not only is social class supposed not to exist in America, it is almost a dirty word—“America's forbidden thought”, in the words of one sociologist.
sentences.sCn: 美国不仅不应该存在社会阶级，而且那几乎是一个肮脏的词——用一位社会学家的话来说就是“美国所禁忌的思想”。

words.tran: 社会的（等于sociologic）；社会学的；针对社会问题的
在社会上；在社交方面；善于交际地
反社会的人；不爱社交的人
社会人际学；计量社会学
